name: Goblin Escape (LD50)
description:
Help a tribe stop a goblin hoarde. Kind of a real time strategy esc survival game. Made for Ludum Dare 50 (theme was Delay the inevitable). No sound, as I ran out of time. 

Press F to toggle full screen (make sure to change the UI scale to small in the main menu).

I hope you enjoy.

-CHANGES-

  • Fixed a typo in the tutorial (building to buildings).
  • Fixed bug where deer stopped moving permanently.
